title: The Inner Mythical
synopsis: A woman discovers a mythical creature living within her consciousness, leading to a transformative journey of self-discovery.
visual_style: Modern urban fantasy with ethereal lighting and subtle magical elements

shots.title: Morning Reflection
shots.visual_description: A woman in her late 20s sits in a modern apartment, looking at her reflection in a mirror. Soft morning light streams through the window. Her expression is contemplative and slightly troubled.
shots.prompt: A young woman in her late 20s sits in a modern apartment bedroom, looking at her reflection in a large mirror. Soft morning sunlight streams through floor-to-ceiling windows, creating warm golden rays. She wears casual sleepwear and has a contemplative, slightly troubled expression. The room has minimalist modern furniture with clean lines. The lighting is ethereal and dreamy, with dust particles visible in the light beams. Shot from a medium close-up angle, focusing on her face and the mirror reflection.
shots.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, low resolution, static, no motion, dark, horror, scary, ugly, deformed, distorted

shots.title: First Vision
shots.visual_description: The woman experiences her first vision of the mythical creature - a glowing, ethereal being that appears to emerge from within her. The creature has translucent wings and an otherworldly presence.
shots.prompt: A woman in a modern apartment experiences a mystical vision. A glowing, ethereal mythical creature with translucent butterfly-like wings emerges from within her chest area. The creature has an otherworldly, peaceful presence with soft bioluminescent glow. The woman's expression shows wonder and awe, not fear. The room is bathed in soft, magical lighting with floating particles of light. The creature appears to be made of pure energy and light, with delicate features and flowing movements. The scene has a dreamlike, magical quality.
shots.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, low resolution, static, no motion, dark, horror, scary, ugly, deformed, distorted, violent, aggressive

shots.title: Urban Discovery
shots.visual_description: The woman walks through a modern city street, but now she sees the mythical creature accompanying her, visible only to her. The creature floats beside her, its presence affecting the environment subtly.
shots.prompt: A woman walks through a modern city street during golden hour. She is accompanied by a glowing mythical creature that floats beside her, visible only to her. The creature has translucent wings and an ethereal presence. The city street has modern buildings, people walking, and traffic, but the creature's presence creates subtle magical effects - small sparkles of light, gentle wind effects, and a dreamy atmosphere. The woman looks peaceful and connected to the creature. The lighting is warm and cinematic, with the creature casting a soft glow on her face.
shots.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, low resolution, static, no motion, dark, horror, scary, ugly, deformed, distorted, violent, aggressive, crowded, chaotic

shots.title: Inner Connection
shots.visual_description: The woman sits in meditation in her apartment, and we see the mythical creature emerging more fully from within her, representing her inner transformation and connection to her true self.
shots.prompt: A woman sits in meditation pose in her modern apartment. A large, beautiful mythical creature with translucent wings and ethereal glow emerges from within her chest and torso area. The creature represents her inner self and transformation. The room is filled with soft, magical lighting and floating particles of light. The woman's expression shows deep peace and connection. The creature has flowing, graceful movements and appears to be made of pure energy and light. The scene has a spiritual, transformative quality with warm, golden lighting.
shots.negative_prompt: blurry, low quality, low resolution, static, no motion, dark, horror, scary, ugly, deformed, distorted, violent, aggressive, religious symbols

shots.title: Shared Experience
shots.visual_description: The woman shares her discovery with a close friend, and the mythical creature becomes visible to the friend as well, creating a moment of shared wonder and connection.
shots.prompt: Two women sit in a cozy modern living room. One woman (the protagonist) gestures toward a glowing mythical creature that floats between them. The creature has translucent wings and ethereal presence. The second woman's expression shows wonder and amazement as she sees the creature for the first time. The room has warm, intimate lighting with the creature casting a soft glow on both women's faces. The scene captures a moment of shared discovery and connection. The creature appears gentle and welcoming, creating a magical atmosphere.

shots.title: Transformation Complete
shots.visual_description: The woman stands on a rooftop at sunset, and the mythical creature fully merges with her, representing her complete transformation and acceptance of her inner magic.
shots.prompt: A woman stands on a modern rooftop at sunset. A large, beautiful mythical creature with translucent wings and ethereal glow merges with her body, representing her complete transformation. The creature's energy flows into her, creating a magical aura around her. The sunset sky provides a stunning backdrop with warm orange and pink colors. The woman's expression shows complete peace, acceptance, and empowerment. The scene has a cinematic, magical quality with the woman glowing with inner light. The transformation is gentle and beautiful, not frightening.

video_details.characters: A woman in her late 20s discovering her inner mythical creature, and a supportive friend
video_details.setting: Modern urban environment with magical elements
video_details.color_palette: Warm golden tones, soft magical lighting, ethereal glows
video_details.additional_details: Focus on the woman's emotional journey and the gentle, beautiful nature of the mythical creature
